name: constellate
description: Federated event management platform implementing ActivityPub protocol

scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build:server" "npm run build:client" --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --kill-others-on-fail false
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta" --kill-others-on-fail false
scripts.docker:dev: docker compose up app1 app2 caddy --build
scripts.docker:dev:down: docker compose stop app1 app2 caddy
scripts.check: concurrently "npm run check:server" "npm run check:client" --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --kill-others-on-fail false
scripts.check:server: npm run lint:server && npm run typecheck:server && npm run knip:server
scripts.check:client: npm run lint:client && npm run typecheck:client && npm run knip:client
scripts.check-fix: concurrently "npm run check-fix:server" "npm run check-fix:client" --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --kill-others-on-fail false
scripts.check-fix:server: npm run format:server && npm run format:prisma && npm run lint:server:fix && npm run typecheck:server && npm run knip:server
scripts.check-fix:client: npm run format:client && npm run lint:client:fix && npm run typecheck:client && npm run knip:client
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint:server" "npm run lint:client" --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --kill-others-on-fail false
scripts.typecheck: concurrently "npm run typecheck:server" "npm run typecheck:client" --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --kill-others-on-fail false
scripts.knip: concurrently "npm run knip:server" "npm run knip:client" --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --kill-others-on-fail false
scripts.format: concurrently "npm run format:server" "npm run format:client" "npm run format:prisma" --names "SERVER,CLIENT,PRISMA" --kill-others-on-fail false

author: Bernhard Hayden <constellate@bhayden.at>
